member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.Bubbles.BubbleNotification
member.summary: Represents a numeric notification bubble that can be displayed next to any control.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the without a specified container.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified container.

member.summary: Fired when the user clicks on a bubble notification.

member.summary: Fires the Click event.
member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.Bubbles.BubbleNotification.Tag
member.summary: Returns or sets the object that contains programmer-supplied data associated with this component.
member.returns: An that contains user data. The default is null.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Bubbles.BubbleNotification.CanExtend(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns true if can offer an extender property to the specified target component.
member.returns: true if the class can offer one or more extender properties; otherwise, false.
member.param: The target object to add an extender property to.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Bubbles.BubbleNotification.Clear
member.summary: Removes all bubbles.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Bubbles.BubbleNotification.GetBubbleValue(Wisej.Web.Control)
member.summary: Returns the notification value associated with the specified control.
member.returns: A containing the value to display in the bubble; when 0, the bubble is hidden.
member.param: The for which to retrieve the value.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.Bubbles.BubbleNotification.SetBubbleValue(Wisej.Web.Control,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows the bubble notification value with the specified control.
member.param: The to associate the JavaScript with.
The value to show in the bubble notification; 0 hides the bubble.

member.returns: A containing the value to display in the bubble; when 0, the bubble is hidden.

member.summary: Shows the bubble notification value with the specified control.
member.param: The to associate the JavaScript with.
The value to show in the bubble notification; 0 hides the bubble.

summary.para: BubbleNotification extender. Adds bubble notifications to any Wisej control.
